message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a special introductory price of $120. It's a great deal for something of this quality.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the quality of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $100 for it. Would you be able to meet me halfway?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $120 is already a very competitive price. How about we settle at $110?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still believe I should only pay up to $100 for this product. Could you consider coming down to $100?
